footnotes: [1967] i.e., the horses bearing riders as they race to attack the enemy.

ayah: And the producers of sparks [when] striking[1968]
footnotes: [1968] Their hoofs while galloping over rocky terrain.

ayah: Arriving thereby in the center[1970] collectively,
footnotes: [1970] i.e., penetrating into the enemy ranks during a surprise attack.

ayah: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.
And indeed, he is to that a witness.[1971]
footnotes: [1971] Through his speech and his actions.

ayah: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.
But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
And that within the breasts is obtained,[1972]
footnotes: [1972] i.e., when all secrets are made known.

ayah: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Aware.[1973]
footnotes: [1973] Fully acquainted and familiar with everything about each one of them.
